title: Kalista is a f*cked champion
body: 1st time playing her and I was kiting a master yi with his ult on.

replies.body: Kalista is the worst champion to come out in awhile. Kalista players are so bad. "I will build attack speed first" or even worse "I will build the new tank item first."
The problem is that it is Master Yi, who is generally a horrible champion :D
Not as much as WW atm.
pretty sure Kalista was brought out just so it could teach people the benefit of "orb walking" so people do it on other champions LOL thanks for teaching us Rito
Kalista is so broken man, my friend's kalista absolutely wrecked my ap yorick with that 20% max health damage.
l0l op, if master yi has ghost probs would killed you tho.
only champion that can kill Kalista is Full AD Hecarim. Confirmed on Saint's stream.

pre level 16 yi maybe.


Also surviving his alpha strike + 2 free auto attacks is pre lucky.

IMO Kalista is horrible considering that she can't cancel autos and the animation is pretty long even with AS Quints so laning phase vs high elo players means you'll be taking harass every time you go for a minion and there's nothing you can do about it.
